full_summary:
### EE517-221414-3: Sprinkler Inspection and Maintenance Services

#### Tender Notice

* **Reference Number**: WS3231104141-DOC3907503992
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3231104141
* **Publication Date**: April 18, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 4, 2023, 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: May 4, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: N/A
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024

#### Tender Status
The tender is **CANCELLED**.

#### Scope of Work

The government intends to acquire sprinkler inspection and maintenance services for the Sept-Îles Airport.

#### Competitive Solicitation Details

* **Procurement Category**: *SRV (Service)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal

#### Selection Criteria

Non-applicable

#### Trade Agreements

* **Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement**
* **Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement**
* **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**
* **Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement**
* **Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)**
* **Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)**

#### Contact Information

* **Dugal, Marie-Claude (SPAC/PSPC)**
* **Email**: [marie-claude.dugal@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:marie-claude.dugal@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: Not available
* **Fax**: Not available

#### Solicitation Description

This tender solicitation cancels and supersedes the previous tender solicitation number Doc3773606440, dated January 12, 2022, with a closing date of February 7, 2023. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders who submitted a proposal for the previous solicitation. The solicitation document contains all the necessary information related to the acquisition of sprinkler inspection and maintenance services for the Sept-Îles Airport.  Note: This entry has been rewritten to only include the relevant information for clarification purposes. None of the data has been changed.
